animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and like to play with yarn. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to chase string.
🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐕‍🦺 I am a good friend to humans.
🎾 I like to play fetch.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat grass.
🥛 I have an udder.
⚫ I am big and black and white (sometimes).

animal.question: I quack and like to swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I lay eggs.
🍞 People often feed me bread.

animal.question: I oink and like to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I am often pink.
🐽 I have a snout.
🥓 People eat me for breakfast.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and grey.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Neigh!' and you can ride on my back. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I like to run in fields.
🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐎 People race me.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my body.
🌿 I like to eat leaves.
🌳 I am the tallest animal.

animal.question: I live in the water and have sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🌊 I swim in the ocean.
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 My stripes are unique to each animal.
🌍 I live on the plains.
🐴 I look a little bit like a horse.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Bunnies love to munch on me!
🥗 I am good for you to eat.
🌱 I grow from a tiny seed.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and a pretty face. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I can be many different colors.
🌻 I grow outside in the sunshine.
💧 I need water to grow big and strong.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and am round and juicy. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White liked me, but the witch didn't.
🥧 People make pies out of me.
🌳 I hang from a tree branch.

plant.question: I am long and orange and good for your eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bugs Bunny loves to eat me.
🐰 I grow under the ground.
👓 They say I help you see better.

plant.question: I am tall and have many leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I am bigger than a bush.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to run up and down me.

plant.question: I am a big plant that can have prickly things on it. I live in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I don't need a lot of water.
☀️ I like hot, dry places.
🏜️ You don't want to hug me!

plant.question: I am a plant that grows very tall and makes yummy yellow things we eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in a field.
🍿 You can pop me!
🌻 I can grow much taller than you!

plant.question: I am a plant with a long stem and pretty red petals. People give me to say 'I love you'. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I smell very sweet.
💘 People give me on Valentine's Day.
🌿 I have thorns, so be careful!

plant.question: I am a very large, strong tree. People live in houses made from my wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 My wood is used to build things.
🐻 Sometimes bears live inside of me.
🌲 I have cones instead of flowers.

plant.question: I am a plant that wraps around other plants or objects. Sometimes I grow on walls. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can climb really high.
🧱 I can grow on a house.
🐒 Tarzan swings on my cousin in the jungle!
